Title: Add JWT authentication endpoint
User Story: As a user I want to authenticate securely so that my data is protected
Description: Implement JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens
Acceptance Criteria:
• Endpoint returns valid JWT token
• Refresh token mechanism works
• Token expiration is configurable
• Rate limiting is implemented

Title: Create password reset flow
User Story: As a user I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account
Description: Implement secure password reset via email verification
Acceptance Criteria:
• Email verification sent
• Token expires after 1 hour
• Password complexity validated
• User notified of success

Title: Implement user registration
User Story: As a new user I want to create an account so that I can access the platform
Description: Create registration endpoint with email verification
Acceptance Criteria:
• Email validation works
• Duplicate emails prevented
• Welcome email sent
• Profile created successfully

Title: Build GraphQL schema
User Story: As a developer I want a GraphQL API so that I can efficiently query data
Description: Design and implement core GraphQL schema and resolvers
Acceptance Criteria:
• Schema validates correctly
• All queries resolve
• Mutations work as expected
• Subscriptions functional

Title: Add REST API versioning
User Story: As a developer I want API versioning so that changes don't break existing clients
Description: Implement versioning strategy for REST endpoints
Acceptance Criteria:
• Version header accepted
• URL versioning works
• Backward compatibility maintained
• Documentation updated

Title: Create metrics dashboard
User Story: As a manager I want to see key metrics so that I can monitor system health
Description: Build dashboard showing KPIs and system metrics
Acceptance Criteria:
• Real-time data updates
• Charts render correctly
• Export functionality works
• Mobile responsive

Title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
User Story: As a developer I want automated deployments so that releases are consistent
Description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment
Acceptance Criteria:
• Tests run on PR
• Build succeeds
• Deploy to staging works
• Rollback capability exists

Title: Add database migrations
User Story: As a developer I want database migrations so that schema changes are tracked
Description: Implement migration system for database schema management
Acceptance Criteria:
• Migrations run successfully
• Rollback works
• Seed data loads
• No data loss

Title: Implement rate limiting
User Story: As a system admin I want rate limiting so that the API is protected from abuse
Description: Add rate limiting to all API endpoints
Acceptance Criteria:
• Rate limits enforced
• Headers show limits
• 429 responses work
• Redis cache works

Title: Create unit test suite
User Story: As a developer I want unit tests so that code quality is maintained
Description: Write comprehensive unit tests for core modules
Acceptance Criteria:
• 80% coverage achieved
• All tests pass
• CI integration works
• Reports generated

Title: Add error monitoring
User Story: As a developer I want error tracking so that issues are quickly identified
Description: Integrate error monitoring and alerting system
Acceptance Criteria:
• Errors captured
• Alerts configured
• Dashboard accessible
• Stack traces included

Title: Implement caching layer
User Story: As a user I want fast responses so that the application feels responsive
Description: Add Redis caching for frequently accessed data
Acceptance Criteria:
• Cache hits work
• TTL configured
• Invalidation works
• Performance improved

Title: Create API documentation
User Story: As a developer I want API documentation so that I can integrate easily
Description: Generate comprehensive API documentation with examples
Acceptance Criteria:
• All endpoints documented
• Examples provided
• Interactive testing works
• Auto-generated from code

Title: Add health check endpoint
User Story: As a DevOps engineer I want health checks so that I can monitor service status
Description: Create health check endpoint for monitoring
Acceptance Criteria:
• Returns 200 when healthy
• Database connection checked
• Redis connection checked
• Response time tracked

Title: Fix memory leak in worker
User Story: As a developer I want to fix memory leaks so that the system remains stable
Description: Identify and fix memory leak in background worker process
Acceptance Criteria:
• Memory usage stable
• No gradual increase
• Garbage collection works
• Performance improved
